name: The Slash of the Dice
description:
Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam!

You are placed into an endless world, with endless waves of enemies attacking you. Can you defeat them all, or will luck prove an obstacle in achieving this goal?

Programmer/Graphics - RGBCube

Music - Henderythmix (https://soundcloud.com/henderythmix)

Source Code - https://github.com/TheFuryBumblebee/TheSlashOfTheDice/
